ygData.subject: Re: coolest emotes
ygData.msgSnippet: I made the horrible mistake once of emoting /em tries to pick your pocket, but Fails! /em tries to pick your pocket, but Fails! /em has picked your pocket for
ygData.messageBody:
I made the horrible mistake once of emoting

/em tries to pick your pocket, but Fails!
/em tries to pick your pocket, but Fails!
/em has picked your pocket for 3pp!

by the entrence to crushbone when about 20 newbies were standing around.

I was getting tells for almost an hour demanding their plat back. At first
I just suggested they steal it back from others, but eventually had to quiet
them all down, telling them to check their inventory (some swore that they'd
had 3 more pp, and they probably honestly thought that they had), and in the
end had to explain to two or three people how emotes work.

Knaeve, Quel, blah blah blah.
